channel.title: Decide which application to build :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Decide which applications to build to enter the market Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 808 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Saas Builder Description: Demisitfy the term “integrations” here. The term is too overloaded. The doc’s contents need to be workshopped. Discuss with Jeff the specific content for this doc. Jeff’s original title for this doc was: “What integrations should I build to enter the market?
